<title level="1" right="Action">[Reloading Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=906) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements** You're wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand, and your other hand either wields a one-handed melee weapon or is empty.

</column>

---

You make a melee attack and then reload your gun in one fluid movement. Strike an opponent within reach with your one-handed melee weapon (or, if your other hand is empty, with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack), and then Interact to reload. You don't need a free hand to reload in this way and this reload doesn't trigger reactions.
